text: Ahmed Zaki Yamani (; 30 June 1930 â€“ 23 February 2021) was a Saudi Arabian politician. He was Minister of Oil and Mineral Resources from 1962 to 1986. He died on 23 February 2021 in London, aged 90. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Saudi Arabian businesspeople Category:Saudi Arabian politicians Category:Cairo University alumni
